messages.subject: Re: Idaho Unschoolers Update
messages.msgSnippet: Hail! Just a note to let our fellow Idaho Unschoolers know that the email addy for the group owner has changed to infreondscipe@yahoo.com. Same person, same
messages.messageBody:
Hail!

Just a note to let our fellow Idaho Unschoolers know that the email
addy for the group owner has changed to infreondscipe@....
Same person, same great group, just a new Yahoo name! We are a newly
formed group for unschoolers and radical unschoolers in the
south/southwestern Idaho area. All are welcome & thanks Ren for
letting us tell about ourselves here!

Thanks & Merry Day to all the fathers!
Chris
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/soidunschool/

teen,
> younger/new families are often looking to us for advice. I love
this

and

>
> If any of you are from our area and want to visit with other local
> unschoolers we just started a new group and a collaborative web
project
> that is being primarily developed by the kids. Come & see us and
help
> us make them into something great :)
>
> Thanks!
> Chris in Boise
>
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/soidunschool/

messages.subject: Idaho Intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hello :) We are happily RUNing with our 13yo ds in the Treasure Valley Area.  We are not really new to unschooling at all but being that I have a teen,
messages.messageBody:
Hello :)

We are happily RUNing with our 13yo ds in the Treasure Valley Area. We
are not really new to unschooling at all but being that I have a teen,
younger/new families are often looking to us for advice. I love this
list because there are so many great ideas for new/transitioning
families, it really helps me to remember what it was like for us and
understand what new families are going through :)

If any of you are from our area and want to visit with other local
unschoolers we just started a new group and a collaborative web project
that is being primarily developed by the kids. Come & see us and help
us make them into something great :)

Thanks!
Chris in Boise

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/soidunschool/
www.idunschool.org
